description.zh-CN: 流行艺术风格，采用鲜艳对比色和大胆图案。创造视觉冲击和艺术表现力，展现波普艺术美学。流行艺术风格采用鲜艳色彩和大胆视觉冲击。创造充满活力的视觉能量和流行审美。
description.en-US: Pop Art style inspired by Andy Warhol and Roy Lichtenstein, featuring bold primary colors, Ben-Day dots, comic-style outlines, and ironic visual creating immersive and engaging digital experiences through thoughtful design principles, modern aesthetics, and user-centered approach to interface development Brings bold, colorful pop art aesthetics to interfaces Perfect for creative applications, artistic content, and eye-catching experiences This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences.
